sourcesContent:
Product Details

{{ product.name }}

{{ product.price | currency }}

{{ product.description }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; //import { Product, products } from '../products'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; import { ProductsService } from "../products.service"; import { Product } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-details', templateUrl: './product-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-details.component.css'], }) export class ProductDetailsComponent { products: Product[]; product: Product | undefined; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private cartService: CartService, private productsService: ProductsService ) { } ngOnInit() { this.get(); // First get the product id from the current route. const routeParams = this.route.snapshot.paramMap; const productIdFromRoute = Number(routeParams.get('productId')); // Find the product that correspond with the id prodivided in route this.product = this.products.find( (product) => product.id === productIdFromRoute ); } get() { this.productsService.getProducts().subscribe({ next(response) { console.log('Products: ', response.body); }, error(msg) { console.log('Error Getting Product: ', msg); } }); } addToCart(product: Product) { this.cartService.addToCart(product); window.alert('Your product has been added to the cart!'); } }
